subject: Public Speaking
title: Religious Values in Audiences
description: Learn Religious Values in Audiences in one minute.

hook.text: Religious audiences respond to moral framing over data.

buildup.text: Sacred values can't be traded for practical benefits.

discovery.text: Violating sacred values triggers moral outrage, not debate.

twist.text: Understanding sacred values prevents catastrophic missteps.

climax.text: Respect sacred values even when you disagree with them.

punchline.text: Respect sacred values. Never dismiss them.
